mainText:
Steve was indeed a visionary.  Its rare to see someone master their craft
with the same finesse as Steve.  Some compare him to Edison, I would compare
him to Einstein.  The man was more than a visionary, he was a pioneer,
executioner and simply put, a genius who has changed the world in ways we
have yet to discover.  Its rare to see a fellow technologist receive the
Nobel Piece award for their contributions but I think he is long overdue and
if IÂ¹m ever asked, he has my vote.

God Bless  you Steve.
author: Bryan
